GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v4.9.334
GSD.description:
misc/vmw_vmci: fix an infoleak in vmci_host_do_receive_datagram()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.334 by commit 7ccf7229b96fadc3a185d1391f814a604c7ef609, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit 06164d2b72aa752ce4633184b3e0d97601017135. For more details please see the references link.
